price: (كله چې راغلل) ویې ویل: زموږ په معبودانو دا (كار) چا كړى؟ بې شكه هغه له ظالمانو څخه دى.
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
